Text:
The first copy of this book had seeding problems so it has been reposted. 

Please seed!

Requests welcome at earReaders email address. Trades also welcome as long as you don't mind the trade being posted as an mp3 audiobook.

Looking for..

Any idea why this torrent keeps getting stuck at one seed?
Not the faintest. I'm stuck at 80.2%.

after reading the replies I looked at my utorrent and see 12 seeds with me being one, so I'm not sure why you are stuck at 80% .

Hope you get the rest because it is a great book.

Cheers earReaders.
